dct_description_sm: Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4480. Map is in four sheets. In upper left margin: "Berlin 1:25,000". In upper right margin: "Sheet 4". Map "B" annex to Protocol on zones of occupation of Germany and the administration of "Great Berlin.". In lower right margin: "Reproduced by Co. "C" 660th Engineers, U.S. Army. Copied from a German map dated 1937". With three insets: "Fortsetzung von lichtenrade", "Nebenkarte 1" and "Nebenkarte 2". GPO-DSSO-3949. Map shows boundaries of parts of Berlin allotted to the U.K., U.S.A., and U.S.S.R.
